text: Martina Capurro Taborda (born 4 December 1994) is an Argentine tennis player. Capurro Taborda has a career high WTA singles ranking of 581 achieved on 17 October 2016. She also has a career high WTA doubles ranking of 701 achieved on 10 April 2017. Capurro Taborda made her WTA main draw debut at the 2016 Brasil Tennis Cup, where she entered the main draw by a lucky loser spot after losing in the final qualifying round. ==ITF circuit finals== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%;" width=15% |- bgcolor="#F88379" | $100,000 tournaments |- bgcolor="#F7E98E" | $75,000 tournaments |- bgcolor="#ADDFAD" | $60,000 tournaments |- bgcolor="lightblue" | $25,000 tournaments |- bgcolor="#f0f8ff" | $15,000 tournaments |} ===Singles (0–1)=== {|class="sortable wikitable" style=font-size:97% |- !Outcome !No. !Date !Tournament !Surface !Opponent !Score |- | style="background:#ffa07a;"|Runner- up | 1. | 12 June 2016 | Buenos Aires, Argentina | Clay | Victoria Bosio | 0–6, 2–6 |} ===Doubles (1–2)=== {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font- size:97%;" !Outcome !No. !Date !Tournament !Surface !Partner !Opponents !Score |- | style="background:#ffa07a;"|Runner-up | 1. | 18 August 2018 | Guayaquil, Ecuador | Clay | Camila Romero | Fernanda Brito Sofía Luini | 6–7(5), 3–6 |- | style="background:#ffa07a;"|Runner-up | 2. | 30 June 2019 | Tabarka, Tunisia | Clay | Anna Turati | Fanny Östlund Alexandra Viktorovitch | 3–6, 6–2, 8–10 |- | style="background:#98fb98;"|Winner | 1. | 14 July 2019 | Tabarka, Tunisia | Clay | Yuliana Lizarazo | Diana Chehoudi Noa Liauw A Fong | 6–2, 6–1 |} == Notes == == External links == * * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine female tennis players
